diff_hunk:
@@ -1483,13 +1483,13 @@ def is_jpeg(contents, name=None):
 
 
 @tf_export('image.decode_image')
-def decode_image(contents, channels=None, name=None):
+def decode_image(contents, channels=None, dtype=dtypes.uint8, name=None):
   """Convenience function for `decode_bmp`, `decode_gif`, `decode_jpeg`,
   and `decode_png`.
 
   Detects whether an image is a BMP, GIF, JPEG, or PNG, and performs the
   appropriate operation to convert the input bytes `string` into a `Tensor` of
-  type `uint8`.
+  type `uint8`. PNG also supports type `uint16`.
body:
The tf.image.decode_image function is based on tf.image.decode_*,
only tf.image.decode_png have `dtype` argument.

*: bmp, gif, jpeg, or png.
body_html:
The tf.image.decode_image function is based on tf.image.decode_*,
only tf.image.decode_png have dtype argument.

*: bmp, gif, jpeg, or png.
body_text:
The tf.image.decode_image function is based on tf.image.decode_*,
only tf.image.decode_png have dtype argument.
*: bmp, gif, jpeg, or png.
